data.404_DESCRIPTION: Looks like you got lost somewhere along the way. Don't worry, the wizard can help you get back!
data.ACCOUNT_LIST_PRIVATE_TOOLTIP: This will label an account as "Private" to serve as a reminder for you to be careful about where you're using it. Click [here]($link) for tips on how to use MyCrypto more privately.
data.ACCOUNT_LIST_REMOVE_OVERLAY_TEXT: Are you sure you want to remove the ‚Äú$label‚Äù account with address: ‚Äú$address‚Äù?
data.ACCOUNT_SELECTION_NO_FUNDS: You don't have an account with sufficient funds.
data.DETERMINISTIC_SCAN_MORE_ADDRESSES: Scan 10 more addresses for the selected derivation path
data.DETERMINISTIC_SCANNING_STATUS_RUNNING: Continuing to scan your hardware wallet, $total total $network addresses scanned.
data.DETERMINISTIC_SCANNING_STATUS_EMPTY: Unable to find any addresses containing $asset.
data.DETERMINISTIC_SCANNING_EMPTY_ADDR: You may select up to $total empty addresses to add at one time. Currently, you have $count of $total selected.
data.DETERMINISTIC_UNABLE_TO_FIND: We were unable to find any addresses that contain $asset.
data.DETERMINISTIC_ALTERNATIVES_4: To view a summary of the addresses we scanned, download a CSV report

data.DETERMINISTIC_CUSTOM_GET_INFORMED: Get informed: [Learn more](https://support.mycrypto.com/general-knowledge/ethereum-blockchain/what-is-a-derivation-path) about derivation paths in the MyCrypto knowledge base.
data.DETERMINISTIC_SEE_SUMMARY: To see a summary of the scanned addresses, download CSV report
data.ADDRESSBOOK_NOTES_PLACEHOLDER: Enter a note for this address
data.ADDRESS_ALREADY_ADDED: This address ($label) has already been added
data.ADDRESS_BOOK_REMOVE_OVERLAY_TEXT: Are you sure you want to remove ‚Äú$label‚Äù address book entry?
data.ADDRESS_BOOK_TOOLTIP: Adding an address to your Address Book allows you to store and add labels to any addresses that you want to remember. Additionally, you can easily send to a stored address by typing the label into the Recipient field on the Send page.
data.ADD_ACCOUNT_DESCRIPTION: Select from the options below to unlock your account and manage your assets.
data.ADD_ACCOUNT_NETWORK_SELECT: Select the blockchain that you want to operate with. Not sure what to choose? Stick with the default choices below and click next.
data.ADD_ACCOUNT_WEB3_DESC: After you've connected, follow the instructions on the screen to access your account
data.ADD_ACCOUNT_WEB3_INSTALL_DESC: Our recommended desktop Web3Provider is the Metamask.io browser extension. Download now to get started!
data.ADD_ACCOUNT_WEB3_INSTALL_FOOTER: Using a Keystore File or a Secret Recovery Phrase?
data.ADD_ACCOUNT_WEB3_INSTALL_FOOTER_LINK: Download the Desktop App to unlock your wallet
data.ADD_ACCOUNT_WEB3_INSTALL_MOBILE_DESC: Download our recommended Web3Provider apps to get started now!
data.ADD_ACCOUNT_WEB3_INSTALL_TITLE: Install a Web3 Provider / Dapp Browser to continue
data.ADD_ACCOUNT_WEB3_TITLE_DEFAULT: Connect and unlock with your Web3 Provider
data.ADD_HARDWAREDESC: Connect & sign via your hardware wallet
data.ADD_VIEW_ADDRESS_DESC: View your account & balances using only your address
data.ADD_WEB3DESC: Connect & sign via your browser or extension
data.BALANCE_TOO_LOW_ERROR: You are trying to send more $asset than you current have. Click ‚Äúsend max‚Äù if you want to send your entire available balance
data.BALANCE_TOO_LOW_NO_RECOMMENDATION_ERROR: You are trying to send more $asset than you current have.
data.LAUNCH_ANNOUNCEMENT: Welcome to the new MyCrypto! Please update your MyCrypto bookmark to $link to go directly to this dashboard from now on.
data.BROADCAST_TX_DESCRIPTION: Paste a signed transaction and click 'send transaction'. You will have a chance to confirm the transaction parameters on the next page before sending.
data.BROADCAST_TX_INVALID_CHAIN_ID: Network with chain id $chain_id not supported.
data.CAPTCHA_INCORRECT_RESPONSE: Incorrect captcha response. Please try again.
data.CAPTCHA_TOOLTIP: In order to verify that you're not a robot, we kindly ask you to fill out this captcha.
data.CHECKOUT_OTHER_CTA: Next: Purchase for a different account
data.CHECKSUM_ERROR: This address is not [checksummed](https://support.mycrypto.com/troubleshooting/sending/not-checksummed-shows-when-i-enter-an-address). Please ensure you have copied & pasted the address. Never hand-type addresses.
data.CONTRACT_SELECTION_PLACEHOLDER: Enter an address or choose a contract
data.CUSTOM_DPATH_ERROR: Please enter a valid [BIP-32 or BIP-44 derivation path](https://github.com/bitcoin/bips/blob/master/bip-0044.mediawiki#path-levels), such as 'm/44'/60'/0'/0'.
data.CUSTOM_NODE_ERROR_CONNECTION: Could not connect to node! Please check if node is up and running.
data.CUSTOM_NODE_QUICKNODE_LINK: Want a node of your own? $link.
data.CUSTOM_NODE_SUBTITLE: Your node must be HTTPS in order to connect to it via MyCrypto.com. You can $myCryptoRepo to connect to any node. Or, get a free SSL certificate via $letsEncrypt.
data.CUSTOM_NODE_SUBTITLE_REPO: download the MyCrypto repo & run it locally
data.DASHBOARD_ACCOUNT_SELECT_TOOLTIP: Use this Account Selector to display the balance of a single account, or the combined balances of any accounts you have added.
data.DASHBOARD_ACTIONS_BUY_SUBTITLE: Hassle-free cryptocurrency, delivered directly to your account
data.DASHBOARD_ACTIONS_SEND_ASSETS_SUBTITLE: Send your assets from your account to another account
data.DASHBOARD_TOKENS_TOOLTIP: Use this area to view detailed information on the tokens in your account(s), scan for new tokens, or add tokens that aren‚Äôt on our default list.
data.DECRYPT_ACCESS: How would you like to access your assets?
data.DEFIZAP_QUESTION_FIVE: How is the MyCrypto Zapper integration different from the functionality of Zapper.fi?
data.DEFIZAP_QUESTION_FIVE_ANSWER: The MyCrypto Zapper integration uses the same process as the Zapper.fi process. MyCrypto‚Äôs Zapper integration adds an extra layer of convenience by allowing you to access Zaps without having to leave MyCrypto. For the full list of available Zaps, visit [Zapper.fi](https://www.zapper.fi).
data.DEFIZAP_QUESTION_ONE_ANSWER: Short for decentralized finance, DeFi refers to financial services for crypto, such as borrowing, lending, and trading, that are usually facilitated using smart contracts on the blockchain. They are often open-source and noncustodial.
data.DEFIZAP_QUESTION_SEVEN: How do I see my Zapper balances?
data.DEFIZAP_QUESTION_SEVEN_ANSWER: Due to technical limitations, at this time we‚Äôre only currently able to give an estimate on some Zap balances, and Zapper recommends checking [pools.fyi](https://pools.fyi/) to view some of your balances/returns. Over time, as we and Zapper explore this further, we anticipate that there will be a better solution for this.
data.DEFIZAP_QUESTION_SIX: After entering a Zap, how do I exit?
data.DEFIZAP_QUESTION_SIX_ANSWER: To exit a Zap, please visit [Zapper.fi](https://www.zapper.fi), go to the Zap that you‚Äôre currently engaged with, and follow the steps that they outline.
data.DEFIZAP_QUESTION_THREE: Which protocols does Zapper interact with and where can I learn about them?
data.DEFIZAP_QUESTION_TWO_ANSWER: There's always risk when interacting with DeFi and smart contracts, and Zapper is an experimental project that is in beta. Using a service like Zapper to interact with protocols for you does add a small amount of additional risk, but most of the risk stems from the actual protocols that are being interacted with.
data.DEFI_DESC_FIRST: Zaps are created by none other than [Zapper.fi](https://www.zapper.fi)! With the intent to help users gain access to decentralized finance (‚ÄúDeFi‚Äù) protocols, Zapper takes complicated processes and turns them into one-click solutions.
data.DEFI_DESC_SECOND: In addition to this easy entry into otherwise complicated DeFi protocols, it‚Äôs all noncustodial. You retain complete control of your funds and can manage everything manually if you‚Äôd like.
data.DEFI_DESC_THIRD: MyCrypto‚Äôs Zapper integration aims to take this one step further and allows one-step access to DeFi protocols without having to leave the comfort of your dashboard.
data.DOWNLOAD_APP_DESCRIPTION: Please download the MyCrypto Desktop app so you can securely complete creating your new account and start managing your funds.
data.DOWNLOAD_APP_FOOTER_INFO_LINK: Learn more about our desktop app.
data.ENS_DOMAINS_NO_DOMAINS_MORE: When at least one of your accounts owns an ENS domain, it will display here. [Click here to get one!](https://app.ens.domains)
data.ENS_EXPIRING_SOON: This ENS name is expiring within 30 days
data.ERROR_0: Please enter a valid amount (number) you wish to send.
data.ERROR_10: This seems like a very high gas price. Are you sure you know what you are doing?
data.ERROR_11: Please enter a valid nonce (Must be a positive integer)
data.ERROR_8: Please enter a gas limit between 21000 and ~800000.
data.ERROR_9: Please enter a valid data value (Must be valid hexadecimal with `0x` appended)
data.ERROR_HIGH_TRANSACTION_FEE_HIGH: Warning! High transaction fee: $fee. [Why?]($link) Please be sure you wish to proceed.
data.ERROR_HIGH_TRANSACTION_FEE_VERY_HIGH: Danger! Very high transaction fee: $fee. [Why?]($link) Please be sure you wish to proceed.
data.TRANSACTION_FEE_NOTICE: FYI: this transaction has a fee of $fee. [Why?](https://support.mycrypto.com/general-knowledge/ethereum-blockchain/what-is-gas)
data.EXCLUDED_ASSET_TABLE_HEADER_TOOLTIP: These are the assets that you've hidden from the Dashboard. Click the plus sign next to an asset to return it to the Dashboard.
data.EXTERNAL_NAVIGATION_WARNING: This will open buy.mycrypto.com in a new tab.
data.FAUCET_API_FAILURE: An API error occured. Please try again later.
data.FAUCET_DESCRIPTION: Are you a developer? Using this faucet, you can request a small amount of testnet ETH for an account on one of the supported testnets: Ropsten, Rinkeby, Kovan, and Goerli.
data.FAUCET_ERROR: If this issue keeps occurring, please [email us]($link) so we can help you and fix it.
data.FAUCET_NO_ACCOUNTS: It looks like you don't have any accounts for one of the supported testnets. In order to proceed, please go ahead and $link_add_account or $link_create_account.
data.FAUCET_LIMIT_REACHED: Unfortunately, you have reached your daily limit. Please try again later.
data.FAUCET_NOT_SURE: Want to learn more about faucets or request a specific amount of testnet ETH?
data.FAUCET_RUNNING_LOW: Our faucet is currently running low on this network. Please try again later.
data.FAUCET_SUCCESS: Success! The testnet ETH has been sent to your wallet.
data.FAUCET_TWEET: I just got testnet ETH using @MyCrypto‚Äôs faucet! Need Ropsten, Rinkeby, Kovan, or Goerli ETH? Visit $faucet_url
data.FAUCET_UNKNOWN_ERROR: Oops, an unknown error occured. Please try again later.
data.GASPRICE_ERROR: Please enter a valid gas price in gwei (Must be a number between 0.1 and 3000)
data.GAS_LIMIT_TOOLTIP: The Gas Limit is the maximum amount of ETH that is allowed to be used to send a transaction. Oftentimes, a transaction will not use all of this, and the remainder will be refunded. Most users do not need to modify this field. [Learn about Gas.](https://support.mycrypto.com/general-knowledge/ethereum-blockchain/what-is-gas)
data.GAS_PRICE_TOOLTIP: A higher Gas Price will ensure that a transaction is confirmed quicker, but it will also raise the Transaction Fee. Most users do not need to modify this field. [Learn about Gas.](https://support.mycrypto.com/general-knowledge/ethereum-blockchain/what-is-gas)
data.GENERIC_ERROR: Something went wrong! Please [email us]($link) so we can help you and fix this.
data.HIDE_ASSET_TOOLTIP: Hide this asset (this can be reverted in Settings).
data.INPUT_PUBLIC_ADDRESS_LABEL: Add a view-only Address or ENS Name
data.INTERACT_ERROR_INVALID_ADDRESS: Please enter a valid contract address.
data.INTERACT_ERROR_INVALID_NETWORK: Network provided in the URL does not exist, all fields have been reset.
data.INTERACT_ERROR_NO_CONTRACT_SELECTED: Please select an existing contract or enter custom contract address and ABI.
data.INTERACT_WRITE_ERROR_MISSING_DATA: Please enter contract name, address and ABI.
data.LEDGER_TIP: Please open the $network app on your Ledger device and follow the on-screen instructions to add this account. If you are unable to do so, please see our [comprehensive troubleshooting guide](https://support.mycrypto.com/troubleshooting/hardware-wallets/ledger/ledger-hardware-wallet-unable-to-connect-on-mycrypto).
data.MEMBERSHIP_ACCORDION_FIRST_CONTENT: The MyCrypto Membership is a monthly subscription that gives you additional features and helps to support MyCrypto‚Äôs future developments.
data.MEMBERSHIP_ACCORDION_FOURTH_CONTENT: As we continue to add features to the MyCrypto Membership, we may adjust the prices. However, if you have an active membership at the time we add new features, you will get access to those new features for no extra cost until your existing membership expires.
data.MEMBERSHIP_ACCORDION_FOURTH_TITLE: Will the price stay the same forever?
data.MEMBERSHIP_ACCORDION_SECOND_CONTENT: 4 DAI (~$4.00) per month, or you can purchase a 12-month package at a discounted rate. For the hardcore, there‚Äôs also a lifetime membership.
data.MEMBERSHIP_ACCORDION_SECOND_TITLE: How much does the MyCrypto Membership cost?
data.MEMBERSHIP_ACCORDION_THIRD_CONTENT: We use the [Unlock Protocol](https://unlock-protocol.com/) for this. You‚Äôll be purchasing a token that unlocks features of MyCrypto when we detect that you hold that token. Each token has an expiration date according to the duration of membership you purchased.
data.MEMBERSHIP_ACCORDION_THIRD_TITLE: How does the MyCrypto Membership work?
data.MEMBERSHIP_ACCORDION_FIFTH_CONTENT: You can currently purchase a MyCrypto Membership on the Ethereum network with DAI or [ETH](https://support.mycrypto.com/how-to/getting-started/how-to-buy-ether-with-usd), or on the xDAI network with [xDAI](https://support.mycrypto.com/general-knowledge/scaling/how-to-get-xdai). We will likely add more payment methods in the future - stay tuned!
data.MEMBERSHIP_ACCORDION_FIFTH_TITLE: What cryptocurrencies can I use to buy a MyCrypto Membership?
data.MEMBERSHIP_COST_TOOLTIP: This is the amount you'll be paying according to the level of membership you've chosen.
data.MEMBERSHIP_DESC_FIRST: MyCrypto is a free, open-source product that you can use in whichever way you desire that is built by our [tight-knit team](https://mycrypto.com/about/) of cryptocurrency addicts.
data.MEMBERSHIP_DESC_SECOND: Purchasing a MyCrypto Membership allows us to keep pursuing our goals of keeping the industry safe, secure, and accessible.
data.MEMBERSHIP_DESC_THIRD: In addition to that, you'll get access to the rapidly-growing list of benefits, listed below.
data.MEMBERSHIP_ERROR: Cannot detect membership status. Please refresh the page or try again. If problem persists, contact [support@mycrypto.com](mailto:support@mycrypto.com)
data.MEMBERSHIP_LIST_SIX: Shirts (must be a member for at least 3 months)
data.MEMBERSHIP_MORE_FAQ: To view more Frequently Asked Questions go [here](https://support.mycrypto.com/general-knowledge/about-mycrypto/membership-information/).
data.MEMBERSHIP_NOTMEMBER: Support MyCrypto and become a member!
data.MEMBERSHIP_STEP1_TEXT: Before purchasing a membership with DAI, you must approve the membership contract to execute the transaction.
data.MEMBERSHIP_STEP2_TEXT: The contract you approved will complete the membership purchase as soon as you confirm the transaction below.
data.METAMASK_PERMISSION_DENIED: You denied the request for permission to access MetaMask, but permission is required to unlock your wallet. Please click "Connect to MetaMask", and then click "Approve" when the dialog opens.
data.MNEMONIC_SUBTITLE: Scanning for assets. To scan for a specific token, select it from the dropdown:
data.MNEMONIC_DPATH_SELECT: Select a derivation path to scan with. You may also choose to
data.NETWORK_TOOLTIP: A network is also known as a blockchain. Most users are here to manage their Ethereum accounts, so this selection defaults to the Ethereum network. [Learn about the other networks that MyCrypto supports.](https://support.mycrypto.com/developers/adding-a-new-network)
data.NEW_FOOTER_TEXT_14: Your email was added to our mailing list!
data.NEW_FOOTER_TEXT_15: *By submitting your email, you **affirmatively** agree to our [Privacy Policy](https://mycrypto.com/privacy/).*
data.NONCE_ERROR: Please double-check your nonce. If this error persists, please email [support@mycrypto.com]($link)
data.NONCE_TOOLTIP: The nonce is the number of transactions sent from a given address and its purpose is to prevent double spending. [Learn more about nonce.](https://support.mycrypto.com/general-knowledge/ethereum-blockchain/what-is-nonce)
data.NOTIFICATIONS_GET_WALLET_DESCRIPTION: Keep your funds safe offline with Trezor or Ledger.
data.NOTIFICATIONS_ONBOARDING_PLEASE_UNDERSTA: Recover, reset, or modify ANY of your information
data.NOTIFICATIONS_ONBOARDING_RESPONSIBLE_MYC: Reducing risk by using the [MyCrypto Desktop App]($link)
data.NOTIFICATIONS_ONBOARDING_RESPONSIBLE_PHI: Making sure you‚Äôre not on a [phishing site]($link)
data.NOTIFICATIONS_ONBOARDING_RESPONSIBLE_PRI: Private Keys / Secret Recovery Phrases / JSON files
data.NOTIFICATIONS_SAVE_DASHBOARD_DESCRIPTION: You've spent a lot of time customizing your dashboard. Make sure to back it up so you don‚Äôt lose your settings.
data.NOTIFICATIONS_WALLETS_ADDED_TITLE: $numNewAccounts new accounts have been added to (or were already on) the dashboard.
data.NOTIFICATIONS_WALLET_ADDED_DESCRIPTION: Your account with the address **$address** has been successfully added!
data.NOTIFICATIONS_WALLET_CREATED_DESCRIPTION: The address of your new MyCrypto account is: **$address**.
You can now add funds to your account and start using MyCrypto. Need help getting started? Check out our resources.
data.NOTIFICATIONS_WALLET_DESCRIPTION_ADD: Your dashboard now shows all your accounts and their balances. Use the ‚ÄúAll Accounts‚Äù dropdown to filter your accounts. Or, check out some other helpful resources.
data.NOTIFICATIONS_WALLET_NOT_ADDED_DESCRIPTI: Your accounts could not be successfully added. This can be due to an invalid network being selected, or if the accounts are all already present on your dashboard.
data.NOTIFICATIONS_WALLET_NOT_ADDED_TITLE: Your account could not be added.
data.NOTIFICATIONS_WALLET_RESOURCE_LOSE: How do I make sure I don't lose crypto?
data.NO_RELEVANT_ACCOUNTS: No accounts with the required amount available
data.NO_RELEVANT_ACCOUNTS_DETAILED: Please connect an account that contains at least $amount $asset.
data.PROTECTED_TX_DONT_PROTECT_MY_TX: I don't want to protect my transaction.
data.PROTECTED_TX_ERROR_ETH_ONLY: We currently only allow transaction protection when you are sending ETH. Please ping us at $supportEmail or on $twitter if you disagree with this choice. We may adjust in the future.
data.PROTECTED_TX_ERROR_LESS_THAN_MIN_AMOUNT: We currently only allow transaction protection when you are sending more than $5.00. Please ping us at $supportEmail or on $twitter if you disagree with this choice. We may adjust in the future.
data.PROTECTED_TX_ETHERSCAN_EXTERNAL_LINK: View comments for this account on $etherscanLink.
data.PROTECTED_TX_GET_TX_PROTECTION_DESC: Gain valuable information about the recipient address and the ability to undo your transaction within 20 seconds.
data.PROTECTED_TX_MODIFY_TX: You can undo or modify this transaction for the next $sec sec
data.PROTECTED_TX_NOT_WEB3_WALLET_DESC: Once you confirm and sign the transaction, you'll have 20 seconds to cancel sending if you change your mind. Still not convinced? [Learn more](https://support.mycrypto.com/general-knowledge/about-mycrypto/what-are-protected-transactions).
data.PROTECTED_TX_PROTECT_THIS_TRANSACTION_DE: Send your transaction with confidence by learning about who you're sending to:
data.PROTECTED_TX_RELAYED_TO_NETWORK: Transaction has been relayed to the network!
data.PROTECTED_TX_REPORT_FOOTER_TEXT: If everything looks good, click "Next" on the left to see a preview of your main transaction.
data.PROTECTED_TX_REPORT_FOOTER_TEXT_NOT_WEB3: Upon confirming and sending the transaction, you'll get $20seconds to cancel if you change your mind.
data.PROTECTED_TX_REPORT_SUBTITLE: If any of the information below is unexpected, please stop and review the address. Where did you copy the address from? Who gave you the address?
data.PROTECTED_TX_SCAN_ACCOUNT_BALANCE_DESC: How much does the account hold?
data.PROTECTED_TX_SCAN_COMMENTS_DESC: If the account is malicious, there will oftentimes be user comments.
data.PROTECTED_TX_SCAN_PARTNER_DB_DESC: We'll let you know if the recipient account is known anywhere.
data.PROTECTED_TX_THIS_TX_IS_PROTECTED_DESC: You have purchased Transaction Protection. Review the report for the recipient address to verify that it is safe before sending your funds.
data.PROTECTED_TX_TIMELINE_MALICIOUS: Malicious: This account has been marked as $tags
data.PROTECTED_TX_TIMELINE_TAGS: The labels for this address are: $tags
data.PROTECTED_TX_TIMELINE_UNKNOWN_ACCOUNT_DE: This doesn't necessarily mean it‚Äôs 'safe' or 'unsafe', just that no information has been collected at this time.
data.PROTECTED_TX_WEB3_WALLET_DESC: Due to technical limitations, the 20 second cancellation timer is unavailable for transactions using $web3WalletName and other Web3 providers.
data.PROTOCOLS_EXPLAINER_COMPOUND_DESC: Compound is a protocol that allows you to borrow and lend assets. Lending assets yields returns in the form of an interest rate.
data.PROTOCOLS_EXPLAINER_KYBER_DESC: Kyber is a protocol that allows the exchange of cryptocurrencies.
data.PROTOCOLS_EXPLAINER_SYNTHETIX_DESC: Synthetix is a synthetic asset platform that allows users to gain exposure to forex, cryptocurrencies, and commodities trading.
data.PROTOCOLS_EXPLAINER_UNISWAP_DESC: Uniswap is a protocol that allows the exchange of cryptocurrencies. Uniswap allows users to contribute liquidity to pools, and liquidity providers yield returns in the form of transfer fees.
data.PTX_MISSING_INFORMATION_DESCRIPTION: Please enter a recipient address and amount in the Send Assets screen in order to protect your transaction.
data.RECENT_TX_LIST_NO_TRANSACTIONS: Your MyCrypto Transactions Will Appear Here!
data.RECENT_TX_LIST_NO_TRANSACTIONS_MORE: $link ETH or Tokens with any of your accounts on MyCrypto to see your transactions.
data.REQUEST_FORM_TOOLTIP: Share this QR code with the party who will be fulfilling the payment request. The party will need to scan the QR code with their preferred crypto app. We recommend [Ambo.io!](https://ambo.io/)
data.RISK_REWARD_COLLATERALIZATION: **Collateralization:** If the crypto price swings, you don‚Äôt get liquidated nor does the entire system collapse.
data.RISK_REWARD_DIVERSIFICATION: **Diversification:** Expand your investment portfolio leveraging your ETH.
data.RISK_REWARD_INNOVATION: **Innovation:** Take advantage of innovative decentralized tools avaiable to ETH holders.
data.RISK_REWARD_INVESTING: **Investing:** Put your ETH to work for you with potential to watch your money grow.
data.RISK_REWARD_LIQUIDITY: **Liquidity:** Markets are less efficient when they are more shallow.
data.RISK_REWARD_SMART_CONTRACT: **Smart Contract:** There is a chance that smart contracts get hacked and you lose all your money.
data.SENDER_TOOLTIP: MyCrypto allows you to send from any of the accounts you have added. Please select the account you‚Äôd like to send from.
data.SENDING_TO_BURN_ADDRESS: This address appears to be a ‚Äúburn‚Äù address. Please be absolutely sure you wish to send to this address. There is no way to reverse a transaction.
data.SENDING_TO_YOURSELF: You are sending to yourself. Are you sure you want to do that?
data.SETTINGS_ACCOUNTS_TOOLTIP: Your accounts will show up here even if you leave and come back, thanks to your browser‚Äôs local storage! MyCrypto never logs, tracks, or stores any of your account information, and your address is only ever transmitted when you submit a transaction to the blockchain.
data.SETTINGS_DANGER_ZONE_TOOLTIP: So fresh and so clean clean! Clears all stored information within the app. You will lose all settings, addresses, accounts, and information if you click this button.
data.SETTINGS_EXPORT_INFO: Your MyCrypto settings file is ready.
data.SETTINGS_FIAT_SELECTION_TOOLTIP: The native currency that will be used to display various conversions, balances, and rates.
data.SETTINGS_IMPORT_COPY: Upload the MyCrypto settings file that you previously exported
data.SETTINGS_IMPORT_INVALID: The file you've selected is not a MyCrypto Settings JSON file. Please select the proper file.
data.SETTINGS_IMPORT_PASTE: or drop your MyCrypto Settings file here.
data.SETTINGS_IMPORT_SUCCESS: You will see the imported files in settings!
data.SETTINGS_PRODUCT_ANALYTICS_TOOLTIP: Help us improve MyCrypto by allowing us to collect basic product analytics. We do not collect any identifiable information like IP address, transaction hash, or address. Read our [privacy policy]($link) for more information.
data.SETTINGS_TOOLTIP: Your MyCrypto Settings include the Accounts in your MyCrypto Wallet, your Saved Address, and other preferences. We will only export or import your MyCrypto Settings. This does not include private keys and exporting is not a way to backup private keys.
data.SIGNER_SELECT_WALLET_QR: Open any app that supports $walletId and scan the QR code.
data.SIGN_MESSAGE_DESCRIPTION: To sign a message, please unlock your account first. Select from the options below.
data.SIGN_MESSAGE_ERROR: There was a problem signing a message. Please try again.
data.SIGN_MSG_PLACEHOLDER: This message you're signing proves you own the address you say you do.
data.SIGN_TX_EXPLANATION: Because we never save, store, or transmit your secret, you need to sign each transaction in order to send it. MyCrypto puts YOU in control of your assets.
data.SIGN_TX_HARDWARE_FAILED_1: You denied the transaction signature request, or the transaction signature request timed out. Please confirm the transaction signature.
data.SIGN_TX_LEDGER_DESCRIPTION: Connect your Ledger to your computer and select the $network application to sign your transaction.
data.SIGN_TX_TITLE: Sign the Transaction with your $walletName wallet
data.SIGN_TX_TREZOR_DESCRIPTION: Connect your Trezor to your computer and enter your Trezor PIN when prompted to sign your transaction.
data.SIGN_TX_WALLETCONNECT_CONFIRM_PROMPT: Please confirm the transaction on your wallet
data.SIGN_TX_WALLETCONNECT_FAILED_ACCOUNT: Please switch the account in your $walletName app to $address in order to proceed.
data.SIGN_TX_WALLETCONNECT_FAILED_NETWORK: Please switch the network in your $walletName app to $networkName in order to proceed.
data.SIGN_TX_WALLETCONNECT_INSTRUCTIONS_1: 1. Open the wallet containing the account
data.SIGN_TX_WEB3_FAILED_ACCOUNT: Please switch the account in $walletName to $address in order to proceed.
data.SIGN_TX_WEB3_FAILED_NETWORK: Please switch the network in $walletName to $networkName in order to proceed.
data.SIGN_TX_WEB3_PROMPT: Sign into $walletName on your computer and follow the instructions in the $walletName window.
data.SIGN_TX_WEB3_REJECTED: Transaction has been rejected or there was an error. Please restart send-flow
data.SUPPORT_MYC_DESC: Buying a MyCrypto Membership is a direct investment in our team, our products, and the future of the industry. Every membership counts and contributes to our growth, while also leveling up your MyCrypto experience with direct benefits, including new features, swag, discounts, and more.
data.SWAP_INTRO: To begin your swap process, we‚Äôll first help you sell your ETH. We will walk you through the process below.
data.SWAP_RATE_TOOLTIP: Your rate is approximate and may vary due to timing and fees associated with your transaction.
data.SWAP_SELECT_ACCOUNT_TOOLTIP: MyCrypto allows you to send from any of the accounts you have added. Please select the account you‚Äôd like to send from.
data.SWAP_STEP1_TEXT: Before swapping a token, you must approve the swap contract to execute the transaction.
data.SWAP_STEP2_TEXT: The contract you approved will complete the swap contract as soon as you confirm the transaction below.
data.SWAP_ZERO_VALUE: Make sure you are inputting a value greater than 0.
data.TOAST_MESSAGE_ADDRESS_HAS_BEEN_ADDED: Address has been added to your address book.
data.TOAST_MESSAGE_CHECK_INTERNET_CONNECTION: Please check your internet connection and refresh the page.
data.TOAST_MESSAGE_PLEASE_RELOAD_THE_APP: Please reload the app or refresh the page
data.TOAST_MESSAGE_SOMETHING_WENT_WRONG: Something went wrong! Please try again.
data.TOAST_MESSAGE_TRANSACTION_DIDNT_GO_THROU: Transaction didn‚Äôt go through. Please try again.
data.TOKEN_SEND_TOOLTIP: Whenever you send a token on the Ethereum blockchain, you‚Äôre actually sending a request to the token contract to move the tokens around. This doesn‚Äôt require any extra action from you, but this is why you see this additional information.
data.TO_FIELD_ERROR: Enter a valid address, ENS name, or blockchain domain
data.TRANSACTION_BROADCASTED_DESC: Your transaction has been sent to the network and will be confirmed in the next few minutes unless [the network is busy](https://support.mycrypto.com/general-knowledge/ethereum-blockchain/why-is-gas) or there's [an error in the transaction](https://support.mycrypto.com/troubleshooting/sending/transactions-not-showing-or-pending).
data.TREZOR_TIP: After you've connected, follow the instructions on screen to access your account.
data.TX_NOT_FOUND: No transaction found with that hash. Make sure you‚Äôve selected the correct network and have input the hash correctly. [Learn more about transaction status.](https://support.mycrypto.com/how-to/sending/checking-the-status-of-a-transaction)
data.UNEXPECTED_ERROR: Something went wrong. Please refresh this page and try again or contact us at $link
data.UNHIDE_ASSET_TOOLTIP: Unhide this asset (will be visible on Dashboard).
data.UNLOCKING_LEDGER_ONLY_POSSIBLE_ON_OVER_H: Unlocking a Ledger hardware wallet is only possible on pages served over HTTPS. You can unlock your wallet at $link
data.VERIFY_MESSAGE_DESCRIPTION: To verify a message, please paste a signature below.
data.VIEW_ONLY_WARNING_TOOLTIP: Note: You cannot send from a view-only account.
data.WALLET_BREAKDOWN_NO_ASSETS_MORE: You can $link with your credit card to get started!
data.WALLET_BREAKDOWN_NO_ASSETS_MORE_HIDDEN: It looks like you've hidden all your assets. You can revert this from the $link.
data.WALLET_DISABLED: This wallet type is disabled on MyCrypto.com. Please download the MyCrypto Desktop App.
data.WARNING_TRANSACTION_FEE: The transaction fee of $fee seems to be greater than the amount you are sending ($amount). [What does this mean?]($link)
data.WARN_SEND_LINK: You arrived via a link that has the address, value, gas, data fields, or transaction type (send mode) filled in for you. You can change any information before sending. Unlock your wallet to get started.
data.ZAPS_AVAIL: MyCrypto‚Äôs Zapper integration will initially allow you to access three Zaps:
data.ZAPS_AVAIL_COMPOUND_POOL: Compound Dai Pool: Swaps 100% of ETH for DAI (using Kyber Network) and contributes it to Compound.
data.ZAPS_AVAIL_DAI_UNIPOOL: DAI Unipool: Swaps 50% of ETH for DAI (using Uniswap) and contributes both ETH & DAI to Uniswap DAI Pool.
data.ZAPS_AVAIL_NOTIF: We‚Äôll be working to add more Zaps over time, but you can access all of the Zaps via [Zapper.fi](https://www.zapper.fi).
data.ZAPS_AVAIL_SETH_UNIPOOL: sETH Unipool: Swaps 50% of ETH for sETH (using Uniswap) and contributes both ETH & sETH to the Uniswap sETH Pool.
data.ZAP_BALANCE_DETECTED: This zap is active in one or more of your accounts.
data.ZAP_BALANCE_TOOLTIP: We've detected that you have a balance on the $protocol protocol.
data.ZAP_BANNER_DESCRIPTION: You have selected to open a position with the following Zap:
data.ZAP_COMPOUND_DAI_POOL_DESCRIPTION: Earn interest of up to 8% a year by contributing to the Compound money market protocol. Remove your ETH price exposure.
data.ZAP_COMPOUND_TOOLTIP: This zap stores funds in the Compound money market protocol
data.ZAP_CONFIRM_DISCLAIMER: Remember, there are no guarantees that you will make money if you do this. Please review the risks you are taking on [here](https://support.mycrypto.com/). You may also review the Zapper protocols [here](https://defizap.com/zaps).
data.ZAP_DAI_UNIPOOL_DESCRIPTION: Hedge against ETH price volatility and earn a variable interest rate (generally 5-25%) by lending on the Uniswap exchange protocol.
data.ZAP_DASHBOARD_PANEL_FOOTER: *Gains are subject to fluctuation relative to market values.
data.ZAP_DASHBOARD_PANEL_HEADER: Put your ETH to work for you
data.ZAP_DASHBOARD_PANEL_SUB_HEADER: With Zapper, you can gain exposure to multiple decentralized finance (DeFi) products and grow the funds in your MyCrypto accounts. [$readMoreText]($readMoreLink).
data.ZAP_RISKS_HEADER: Risks and Rewards when using Zapper
data.ZAP_SETH_UNIPOOL_DESCRIPTION: Preserve your ETH price exposure and earn a variable interest rate (generally 1-2%) by lending on the Uniswap exchange protocol.
data.ZAP_UNISWAP_TOOLTIP: This zap stores funds in the Uniswap exchange protocol
data.REP_TOKEN_MIGRATION_STEP1_TEXT: Before migrating your v1 REP to v2 REP, you must approve the v2 contract which will allow for migration.
data.REP_TOKEN_MIGRATION_STEP2_TEXT: After the REP v2 contract has been approved, confirm the transaction below to conduct the actual migration. This will complete the migration.
data.REP_TOKEN_MIGRATION_AMOUNT_DISABLED_TOOL: This tool is intended to migrate all of your REP tokens from v1 to v2, so this field cannot be modified.
data.NO_ACCOUNTS_SELECTED_DESCRIPTION: To view your balances, select at least one account in the dropdown above.
data.ZAP_WITHDRAW_TOOLTIP: Withdrawing from this Zap requires interacting with Uniswap. If you need assistance, please read [How To Withdraw from Unipool](https://support.mycrypto.com/how-to/defi/how-to-withdraw-from-unipool).
data.WARN_SEND_INCORRECT_PROPS: The pre-filled transaction settings in the URL are incorrect - they may be incomplete or constructed improperly. Please reconstruct the URL and try again. [Learn how to construct transaction resubmission links](https://support.mycrypto.com/how-to/sending/creating-prefilled-transaction).
data.WARN_SEND_UNDETECTED_NETWORK_OR_ACCOUNT: We couldn't resolve your pre-filled transaction settings - either you do not have the 'Sender' account added to your dashboard or you're not on the specified network. Please double check that these are correct and try again. [Learn more about speedupting a transaction](https://support.mycrypto.com/how-to/sending/checking-or-replacing-a-transaction-after-it-has-been-sent).
data.SPEED_UP_TOOLTIP: You can speed up or cancel pending transactions from accounts that you have added to your dashboard. Web3 and WalletConnect accounts will not work because they don't allow us to set gas settings.
data.TX_QUERY_DEFAULT_BANNER: You're attempting to send a transaction with pre-filled settings.
data.TX_QUERY_SPEED_UP_BANNER: You are attempting to speed up a transaction.
data.TX_QUERY_CANCEL_BANNER: You are attempting to cancel a transaction.
data.TX_QUERY_DEFAULT_TOOLTIP: You've arrived here from a pre-filled transaction link. Make sure the settings are correct before continuing. [Learn more](https://support.mycrypto.com/how-to/sending/creating-prefilled-transaction).
data.TX_QUERY_SPEED_UP_TOOLTIP: This transaction will speed up a previously pending transaction with the same nonce. It does so by sending the same transaction but with a higher gas price.
data.TX_QUERY_CANCEL_TOOLTIP: This transaction aims to cancel a previously pending transaction. It does so by sending a 0.00 ETH transaction to yourself (with the same nonce as the previous transaction) with the purpose of being mined before the original transaction.
data.SENDING_TO_TOKEN_ADDRESS: You are sending to the $token contract. If you want to send $token to an address, change the Recipient to the address you want to send the $token to. If you send value to the $token contract itself, it will likely be irrecoverable.
data.DISABLED_NONCE: Nonce can only be adjusted via $provider's interface. [Learn more](https://support.mycrypto.com/how-to/sending/how-to-change-nonce-external-provider).
data.UPDATE_LABEL_ACTION_HEADING: Update a label for your past transactions
data.UPDATE_LABEL_ACTION_BODY_1: Labels are the bee's knees. They can help you recall the purpose of a past transaction. They can act as a check that you are sending to the correct address. But, most importantly, they're yours. They're private. They live only in your browser, not our servers.
data.UPDATE_LABEL_ACTION_BODY_2: You can add/update a label almost anywhere you see an address on MyCrypto, like in your Accounts list or Address book.
data.MIGRATE_REP_ACTION_BODY: One or more of your accounts hold REPv1 tokens. Migrate them to v2 now!
data.CLAIM_TOKENS_ACTION_BODY: One or more of your accounts have unclaimed $token tokens. Claim them now!
data.RENEW_ENS_ACTION_BODY: You have one or more ENS names expiring soon. Don't let them get away from you - renew them now!
data.BUY_HW_ACTION_HEADING: Level up your security: Get a hardware wallet
data.BUY_HW_ACTION_BODY: If you have any amount of crypto that you would not want to lose, it's best to get yourself a hardware wallet. With a hardware wallet, your private key never leaves the device and is generally safer than any other method of storage.
data.MYC_MEMBERSHIP_ACTION_HEADING: Level up your life: Become a MyCrypto member
data.MYC_MEMBERSHIP_ACTION_BODY: Enjoying your MyCrypto experience? Kick it up a notch and become a MyCrypto Member. Unlock the full potential of MyCrypto AND support our team - it's a win/win!
data.ADD_ACCOUNT_ACTION_HEADING: Add another account to your MyCrypto
data.ADD_ACCOUNT_ACTION_BODY: Having added to MyCrypto is a start, but you've barely scratched the surface! Add another account and experience our multi-account management magic!
data.BACKUP_ACTION_BODY: You've spent a lot of time customizing your dashboard. Make sure to export your settings so you don't have to start from scratch if you get a new device or reset your browser's storage & cache.
data.FEEDBACK_ACTION_HEADING: Tell us what you love or hate about MyCrypto
data.FEEDBACK_ACTION_BODY_1: We build this product for you. Each time you give us feedback‚Äîsmall or large, good or bad‚Äîour product and decisions get better.
data.FEEDBACK_ACTION_BODY_2: What's working? What's not? What do you wish you could do? Where are the extra clicks? What makes your blood boil each time you run across it? Tell us. Be brutally honest. We can't be better without you.
data.NEWSLETTER_ACTION_BODY: Stay up to date by getting the latest MyCrypto updates directly to your inbox!
data.TELEGRAM_ACTION_BODY: Join our community, hang with our team team, and chat with RoboCop. Yes, RoboCop.
data.SWAP_ACTION_BODY: Swap tokens directly within your wallet, and with the best rates, thanks to [0x](https://0x.org/)!
data.TWITTER_ACTION_BODY: Day-to-day updates, hot takes from our CEO, and more. Just do it.
data.AAVE_TOKEN_MIGRATION_STEP1_TEXT: Before migrating your LEND to AAVE, you must approve the migrator contract which will allow for migration.
data.AAVE_TOKEN_MIGRATION_STEP2_TEXT: Confirm the transaction below to conduct the LEND to AAVE migration. This will complete the migration.
data.AAVE_TOKEN_MIGRATION_AMOUNT_DISABLED_TOO: This tool is intended to migrate all of your LEND to AAVE tokens, so this field cannot be modified.
data.MIGRATE_LEND_ACTION_BODY: One or more of your accounts hold LEND tokens. Migrate them to AAVE now!
data.MIGRATE_ANT_ACTION_BODY: One or more of your accounts hold ANTv1 tokens. Migrate them to v2 now!
data.ANT_TOKEN_MIGRATION_STEP1_TEXT: Before migrating your v1 ANT to v2 ANT, you must approve the migrator contract which will allow for migration.
data.ANT_TOKEN_MIGRATION_STEP2_TEXT: After the migrator contract has been approved, confirm the transaction below to conduct the actual migration. This will complete the migration.
data.ANT_TOKEN_MIGRATION_AMOUNT_DISABLED_TOOL: This tool is intended to migrate all of your ANT tokens from v1 to v2, so this field cannot be modified.
data.GAS_LIMIT_ESTIMATION_ERROR_MESSAGE: Something went wrong: $error. Make sure you've filled everything out correctly and try again. If this error persists, please visit our [Knowledge Base](https://support.mycrypto.com/troubleshooting/sending/gas-required-exceeds-allowance-or-always-failing-transaction) for further assistance.
data.MIGRATE_GOL_ACTION_BODY: One or more of your accounts holds $GNT tokens. Migrate them to $GLM now!
data.GOLEM_TOKEN_MIGRATION_STEP1_TEXT: Confirm the transaction below to conduct the Golem v1 to v2 migration. This will complete the migration.
data.GOLEM_TOKEN_MIGRATION_AMOUNT_DISABLED_TO: This tool is intended to migrate all of your Golem tokens from v1 to v2, so this field cannot be modified.
data.NO_TOKENS_CONTENT: It looks like you don't have any tokens in your selected wallets. $link
data.DELETE_NETWORK_TOOLTIP: Please delete your accounts and contacts using the network before deleting the network
data.DASHBOARD_ACTIONS_REQUEST_ASSETS_SUBTITL: Share your address or request a specific payment amount
data.FAUCET_ACTION_HEADING: Need Testnet ETH? Use our faucet!
data.FAUCET_ACTION_BODY: It looks like you have an Ethereum testnet account. If you‚Äôre running low on testnet ETH for Ropsten, Rinkeby, Kovan, or Goerl, you can request it from our faucet.
data.LOW_GAS_PRICE_WARNING: This seems like a very low gas price. Are you sure you know what you are doing?
data.BROADCAST_TX_RAW_TOOLTIP: This is the decoded values of your signed transaction input.
data.DEMO_BANNER: Viewing in DEMO MODE. Play around in this test environment and $link of your own to get started.
data.DEMO_GATEWAY_BANNER: You are currently in DEMO MODE. To continue with sending a transaction, please $link to exit demo mode.
data.NOT_ENOUGH_GAS: The account you're sending from does not have enough gas to complete this transaction. Please add more $baseAsset to your account and try again. [Learn about gas.](https://support.mycrypto.com/general-knowledge/ethereum-blockchain/what-is-gas)
data.DANGERZONE_CONFIRM: Are you sure you want to do this? This will reset your browser's LocalStorage for MyCrypto and clear all of your accounts, balances, and settings. This cannot be undone.
data.ENS_NO_ADDRESS_RECORD: $domain is not configured - no address record
data.BUSY_BOTTOM_HEADER: Can't find what you're looking for?
data.EXPORT_MOBILE_NOTICE: Some mobile dapp browsers prevent downloading files - in that case, you can copy the above text manually.
data.VIEW_ONLY_ADDR_DISCLAIMER: Adding a "view-only" account means that you will not be able to send a transaction from it. If you want the ability to send from this account, please choose another method of connection on the [Add Account](/add-account) screen. Or, you can add it as "view-only" for now and [fully connect it at another time]($link).
data.SWAP_AMOUNT_TOOLTIP: This is confirming the amounts you want to convert and receive.
data.SWAP_TX_FEE_TOOLTIP: The approximate amount you will pay to complete your swap. Includes platform fees, network fees and the cost to approve a token when necessary.
data.SWAP_EXPIRY_TOOLTIP: Your quoted amount and rate will expire after a time. To refresh this, select "Get New Quote."
data.TOO_MANY_DECIMALS: The asset you have selected supports a maximum of $decimals decimals.
data.NO_NON_VIEW_ONLY_ACCOUNTS: You currently only have $link_support addresses added to MyCrypto, which you cannot send from. Please $link_add_account.
data.PRIORITY_FEE_MAX_ERROR: Priority Fee must be smaller than or equal to Max Fee
data.MAX_FEE_TOOLTIP: This is the highest total gas price that you're willing to pay for your transaction.
data.GAS_LIMIT_TOOLTIP_2: This is the amount of units of gas required to compute your transaction.
data.BASE_FEE_TOOLTIP: This is the minimum gas price required for your transaction to be included in the next block.
data.PRIORITY_FEE_TOOLTIP: This is an optional amount that gets paid to a miner for processing your transaction.
data.LEDGER_FIRMWARE_NOTICE: If you cannot connect to your Ledger, make sure your Ledger firmware is up to date in the Ledger Live application.
data.MTX_GENERIC_ERROR: An error occurred. Please try again, and [contact us]($link) if it doesn‚Äôt resolve.
data.BASE_FEE_HIGH: The network is seeing a spike in activity right now and fees are surging. If you're not in a rush, it may be best to send this transaction a bit later.
data.BASE_FEE_VERY_HIGH: The network is seeing insane spikes in fees right now, probably because of a new NFT drop or something. It's recommended to wait for fees to get back to normal before sending this transaction.
data.TRANSACTION_SUCCESS_HEADER: Your transaction made it into the block!
data.TRANSACTION_PENDING_DESCRIPTION: Sit tight while we evaluate whether your transaction will be included in the next block. We'll have an answer for you in 30 sec or less!
data.TRANSACTION_SUCCESS_DESCRIPTION: Woohoo, we can confirm that your transaction will be mined in the next block.
data.TRANSACTION_CROWDED_DESCRIPTION: You might consider resending your transaction with adjusted fees to increase the likelihood that it will be included in the next block.
data.PENDING_METAMASK_NOTICE: Please use MetaMask to speed your transaction up. You can safely use the values they recommend.
data.PENDING_WEB3_NOTICE: Please use your Web3 Provider directly to replace or speed up your transaction. If you aren't sure how to do this, we can help at [support@mycrypto.com]($link).
